timeline.message: Return ByteBuf in GetResponse content() method

timeline.bodyText:
Removing this because of three reasons

This method only deal with data chunk, and changing blob size in property is already done in metadata chunk.
There is a race condition when the frontend is writing header back to client but the blob size is changed at the same time.
Here the size is undecrypted size, we have to run decryption to get the real size.
@ankagrawal
